---
name: New API request
about: Suggest a new API for the list
title: "feat(category): Add API Name"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

**API Name**
Name of the API.

**Description**
Short description of what it does.

**Documentation URL**
Link to the API documentation.

**Category**
Which category does this belong to? (e.g., animals, weather, finance)

**Auth Type**
- [ ] No Auth
- [ ] API Key (Free tier available)
- [ ] OAuth
- [ ] Other: _____

**Try-it URL (Optional)**
An example GET endpoint that works without auth (or with a free key).

```
https://api.example.com/v1/data
```
